column4: if I always want to mount a second drive to ubuntu, do I just hack out the fstab with a texteditors, or is there a GUI or something to do it for me?
how do I check if ubuntu picked up my nvidia video card?
type  lspci in a console, and  "dmesg | grep nvidia"
ok so lspci showed the nvidia card, but dmesg | grep nvidia didn't show anything
